SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.title AS title, r.host_user_nickname AS nickname, mc.name AS midCategoryName, sc.name AS subCategoryName, r.max_participants AS maxParticipants, r.gender AS gender, r.created_at AS createdAt
FROM room r LEFT JOIN category sc ON r.categoryId = sc.id LEFT JOIN category mc ON sc.parent_id = mc.id ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
